WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 04 THRU 10 APR
   BY M/V RAMFORM TETHYS TOWING 14
   8000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   26-45.04S 044-58.45W, 26-44.55S 046-40.34W,
   26-49.19S 046-41.07W, 27-14.59S 047-04.48W,
   27-28.07S 047-16.30W, 28-14.34S 047-16.30W,
   28-14.39S 044-58.26W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 110001Z APR 23.
